lead_paragraph: John A. Paulson and Sallie L. Krawcheck are staking a lot on the revival of Bank of America’s fortunes, Breakingviews.com writes. Mr. Paulson, the billionaire hedge fund manager, is now the bank’s fourth-largest shareholder.
